{{Wired embedded system |brand=ihiji |model=INV-APP |revision=-750 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AAEON |manuf_model=PBA-BT05 |manuf_rev=A0.1 |est_release_date=12/2016 |pcb_id=1907BTO510 |type=network monitor |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Celeron |cpu1_model=N2807 |cpu1_cspeed=1.58 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung <!-- AAEON --> |ram1_model= <!-- DDR3L SODIMM --> |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=mSATA |expansion_sata_num=1 |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8111E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=LPC I/O Processor;Fintek;F81801U;;1;,,, 3V-28V D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS53219A;;1;,,, Dual Channel (3-Phase CPU/1-Phase GPU) SVID, D-CAP+ Step-Down Controller for IMVP-7 Vcore;TI;TPS59641;;1;,,, 25A Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Stage;TI;CSD97395Q4M;;1;,,, 150mA LDO Linear Regulator;Yobon Tech;YB1282;;2;,,, 40V N-Channel MOSFET;Infineon;BSC027N04LS;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;NXP;PH6030L;;6; |flags=RTC w/ battery, metal case |stock_boot=Grub;0.97; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32-504;Centos 6.6; |oui_eth=00:07:32 }} {{TagLine|ihiji INV-APP-750}}
*OEM: ''AAEON Technology Inc.'' (an ''[[ASUS]]'' assoc.)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] N2807 Dual-Core (@1.58GHz) *Memory: 1GB ''AAEON'' DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :8GB mSATA SSD *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
===Models=== *[[Ihiji INV-APP-500]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-750]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-1100]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-2100]]
